solution_line_template: The number of computers produced in 1 week is {computers_per_day} * {days_in_week} = <<{computers_per_day}*{days_in_week}={computers_per_week}>>{computers_per_week} computers.
The total amount earned selling 1 week of production is {computers_per_week} * {price_per_computer} = $<<{computers_per_week}*{price_per_computer}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
